name: Pudding Dash
description:
this is a game i made for fun!, contains copyrighted material so i don't put it to google play, it is basically a "Geometry Dash" -like game with gacha skin and endless game mode XD (and without music / sound). 


new update :
- Legendary Skin!

-Epic Skin!

- over 25++ new common skin!

- add variation of endless level!

- Got a Same skin at Gacha will sell it for 25!

- when you finish the current campaign (5), you will get reward of 2000 gold!

 -fixed minor bugs!
